description: This recipe brings a lightly spiced nutty sauce to the diced chicken.
keywords: Southeast Asian curry,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Chicken & Capsicum Satay Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the peanut oil.
Fry the chicken for 10 minutes while turning.
Add the mixed capsicum, onion and garlic to the pan and continue to fry for a further 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan and combine fully.
Bring the dish to the boil while stirring and then bring to a simmer for 15 minutes.
Once the sauce has started to reduce and thicken, remove from the heat and serve with a choice of sides.
